content.body:
### Shop 245/55R18 Tire Size The 245/55R18 tire size is interesting; you can find it on crossovers like the Hyundai Santa Fe, Honda CR-V, Subaru Outback and Jeep Cherokee as well as the Dodge Charger, Chevrolet Camaro and Dodge Grand Caravan. For most drivers of vehicles like these, all-season tires make the most sense thanks to their balance of low noise, ride comfort, stable handling and year-round traction, even in light snow. Some of our favorite premium all-season tires in the 245/55R18 size include the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Firestone All Season, BFGoodrich Advantage Control, and Hankook Kinergy PT (H737). Popular vehicles: 2015-2018 Hyundai Santa Fe
2007-2018 Honda CR-V
2014-2021 Subaru Outback
2014-2018 Jeep Cherokee
2015-2020 Dodge Charger
2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro
2011-2021 Dodge Grand Caravan If you’re the kind of driver who likes to push the envelope a little and enjoys sharp, responsive cornering, you should maybe consider performance and ultra-high-performance (UHP) tires. Performance and UHP tires are designed with a softer, stickier tread formulation that’s designed to really hang in on corners while providing good wet or dry traction. Pirelli P Zero All Season Plus, [Kumho Ecsta PA31](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/ecsta-pa31), or Nexen N Priz AH8. Maybe you live in a part of the country that has harsh winters, with snow that lingers for weeks on the roads and subfreezing temperatures. If that’s the case, dedicated winter tires can deliver reliable traction when all season tires just can’t get the job done. Some of our favorite winter tires include the Bridgestone Blizzak LM-32, Toyo Observe GSi-6 HP, Falken Eurowinter HS01 and [Hankook Winter i cept evo2 (W320)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/winter-i-cept-evo2-w320). Whether you drive a Hyundai Santa Fe, Honda CR-V, Dodge Charger, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 245/55R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
